0x00400000	addi	$t0, $0, 7
0x00400004	addi	$t1, $0, 0
0x00400008	lui 	$at, 4097
0x0040000c	ori 	$t2, $at, 0
0x00400010	lw		$t3, 0($t2)
0x00400014	addi	$t3, $t3, 1
0x00400018	sw		$t3, 0($t2)
0x0040001c	beq		$t0, $t1, 3
0x00400020	addi	$t1, $t1, 1
0x00400024	addi	$t2, $t2, 4
0x00400028	j		0x00100004
0x0040002c	addi	$v0, $0, 10
0x00400030	syscall
